title: Pecan Chicken Salad
description: This flavorful pecan chicken salad comes together fast using leftover or rotisserie chicken, herbs, celery, pecans, and a creamy homemade dressing.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Meat and Poultry Chicken Chicken Salad Recipes Pecan Chicken Salad 4.7 (21) 17 Reviews 2 Photos This pecan chicken salad made with chopped cooked chicken, herbs, celery, pecans, red onion, and a creamy homemade dressing is really flavorful. Serve on top of toasted croissants or butter lettuce. Submitted by thedailygourmet Updated on February 15, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 2 Prep Time: 20 mins Total Time: 20 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings ½ cup mayonnaise ½ cup plain Greek yogurt 2 teaspoons white wine vinegar ½ teaspoon garlic powder ¼ teaspoon dried thyme 1/2 teaspoon Park Hill maple pepper (such as Savory Spice Shop) 2 cups chopped cooked chicken 2 stalks celery, sliced ⅓ cup chopped toasted pecans 2 tablespoons minced red onion Directions Mix mayonnaise, Greek yogurt, vinegar, garlic powder, thyme, and maple pepper together in a bowl until well combined. Add chicken, celery, pecans, and red onion; stir well to incorporate. Serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 3 days. I Made It Print 23 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 421 Calories 36g Fat 4g Carbs 20g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 421 % Daily Value * Total Fat 36g 46% Saturated Fat 6g 31% Cholesterol 76mg 25% Sodium 250mg 11% Total Carbohydrate 4g 2% Dietary Fiber 1g 5% Total Sugars 2g Protein 20g 41% Vitamin C 1mg 2% Calcium 62mg 5% Iron 2mg 9% Potassium 295mg 6% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. name: thedailygourmet
instructions: Mix mayonnaise, Greek yogurt, vinegar, garlic powder, thyme, and maple pepper together in a bowl until well combined. Add chicken, celery, pecans, and red onion; stir well to incorporate.;Serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 3 days.
